title: Deep learning model design for mental fatigue detection using EEG data

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Machine Learning, Basic Signal Processing Concepts, Teacher Training Experience
context.additional_context: Corporate teacher training program aiming to enhance mental fatigue management and learner status monitoring capabilities in language education settings

learning_goals: Time-frequency domain feature extraction methods from EEG signals (e.g., Morlet wavelet analysis) can be explained.
A mental fatigue detection model using a shallow convolutional neural network (3 convolutional layers) can be implemented.
Model decision factors can be interpreted and applied to educational contexts through SHAP value analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
